buffalo3d.vos

Class Light

  • java.lang.Object
    • buffalo3d.vos.AbstractDirtyManaged
      • buffalo3d.vos.Light
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDirtyManaged, IDirtyParent

    public class Light
extends AbstractDirtyManaged
implements IDirtyParent
    Light must be added to Scene to take effect. Eg, "scene.lights().add(myLight);"

      • isVisible

        public boolean isVisible()

      • isVisible

        public void isVisible(Boolean $b)

      • type

        public LightType type()
        Default is DIRECTIONAL, matching OpenGL's default value.

      • type

        public void type(LightType $type)

      • spotExponent

        public float spotExponent()
        0 = no attenuation towards edges of spotlight. Max is 128. Default is 0, matching OpenGL's default value.

      • spotExponent

        public void spotExponent(float $f)

      • spotCutoffAngle

        public float spotCutoffAngle()
        Legal range is 0 to 90, plus 180, which is treated by OpenGL to mean no cutoff. Default is 180, matching OpenGL's default value.

      • spotCutoffAngle

        public void spotCutoffAngle(Float $f)

      • spotCutoffAngleNone

        public void spotCutoffAngleNone()
        No cutoff angle (ie, no spotlight effect) (represented internally with a value of 180)

      • attenuationSetAll

        public void attenuationSetAll(float $constant,
                              float $linear,
                              float $quadratic)
        Defaults are 1,0,0 (resulting in no attenuation over distance), which match OpenGL default values.
